Key Match Events: Max Kepler provided an iconic slide during Saturday afternoon’s 8-4 victory over the New York Mets after his pinch hit, two-out, three-run triple broke open a tight contest.
Post-Match Reflections: Max Kepler expressed joy in winning ballgames and scoring runs, emphasizing the fun in celebrating with his team.
Twins manager Rocco Baldelli praised Kepler's performance and emotional displays, acknowledging his hard work.
Kepler's hitting coach David Popkins highlighted Kepler's mental control and enjoyment of the game, noting the positive impact on his performance.
Twins president of baseball operations Derek Falvey reflected on Kepler's perseverance through struggles and the team's decision to keep him on the roster.
